between two devices on the same host
• Collected run-time and memory usage data and adapted an XGBoost model to predict victim’s activity

• Implemented collaborative-filtering algorithm by encoding games and using K-Nearest-Neighbors and furthered it by

• Functionalities included: account creation and verification (only utexas emails are allowed), customer-to-buyer
